surveys.title: Employee Engagement Survey
surveys.description: Help us understand how engaged you feel at work. Your feedback is valuable for improving our workplace environment.

questions.text: How satisfied are you with your current role?
Do you feel your work is valued by the company?
Would you recommend this company as a great place to work?

surveys.thankYouMessage: Thank you for completing the Employee Engagement Survey! Your responses have been recorded and will help us create a better workplace for everyone.

surveys.title: Customer Satisfaction Survey
surveys.description: Tell us about your experience with our products and services.

questions.text: How would you rate our product quality?
How likely are you to recommend us to others?

surveys.thankYouMessage: Thank you for your valuable feedback! We appreciate you taking the time to help us improve.
